title: Mobile App isnt showing summoner icons or builds or champions in the match history of my friends
body: On my lol mobile app, the icons that are supposed to show summoner icons appear as question marks instead of the actual icons. i tried reinstalling, but that didn't work. What should i do ?

replies.body:
Hey,
Is this issue still happening? Could you please let us know which phone you're using and OS version if you know it (ie. Samsung Galaxy S7, android 6.0)

Does the rest of the app function normally? Did you also check the app store for updates?

Thanks for the report
